016package org.vafer.jdeb.utils;
017
018import java.util.HashMap;
019import java.util.Map;
020import java.util.Properties;
021
022import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
023import org.codehaus.plexus.interpolation.InterpolationException;
024import org.codehaus.plexus.interpolation.RegexBasedInterpolator;
025
026/**
027 * Resolve variables based on a Map.
028 *
029 * ATTENTION: don't use outside of jdeb
030 */
031public final class MapVariableResolver implements VariableResolver {
032
033    private final Map<String, String> map;
034
035    public MapVariableResolver( Map<String, String> map ) {
036        this.map = map;
037    }
038
039    public String get( String key ) {
040        return map.get(key);
041    }
042
043    public static MapVariableResolverBuilder builder() {
044        return new MapVariableResolverBuilder();
045    }
046
047    public static class MapVariableResolverBuilder {
048        private String name;
049        private MavenProject mavenProject;
050        private Properties systemProperties;
051        private String buildDirectory;
052        private String version;
053
054        public MapVariableResolverBuilder withName(String name) {
055            this.name = name;
056            return this;
057        }
058
059        public MapVariableResolverBuilder withMavenProject(MavenProject project) {
060            this.mavenProject = project;
061            return this;
062        }
063
064        public MapVariableResolverBuilder withSystemProperties(Properties properties) {
065            this.systemProperties = properties;
066            return this;
067        }
068
069        public MapVariableResolverBuilder withBuildDirectory(String directory) {
070            this.buildDirectory = directory;
071            return this;
072        }
073
074        public MapVariableResolverBuilder withVersion(String version) {
075            this.version = version;
076            return this;
077        }
078
079        public MapVariableResolver build() {
080            if( this.mavenProject == null || this.systemProperties == null ) {
081                throw new IllegalStateException("MavenProject and system properties must be set");
082            }
083
084            Map<String, String> variables = new HashMap<String, String>() ;
085
086            Map<String, String> combinedProperties = new HashMap<>();
087            combinedProperties.putAll((Map) this.mavenProject.getProperties());
088            combinedProperties.putAll((Map) this.systemProperties);
089
090            // Expand (interpolate) values using RegexBasedInterpolator
091            RegexBasedInterpolator interpolator = new RegexBasedInterpolator();
092            for (Map.Entry<String, String> entry : combinedProperties.entrySet()) {
093                interpolator.addValueSource(new org.codehaus.plexus.interpolation.MapBasedValueSource(combinedProperties));
094                try {
095                    String expandedValue = interpolator.interpolate(entry.getValue(), "");
096                    variables.put(entry.getKey(), expandedValue);
097                } catch (InterpolationException e) {
098                    // Fallback to original value if interpolation fails
099                    variables.put(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue());
100                }
101            }
102
103            variables.put("name", this.name != null ? this.name : this.mavenProject.getName());
104            variables.put("artifactId", this.mavenProject.getArtifactId());
105            variables.put("groupId", this.mavenProject.getGroupId());
106            variables.put("version", this.version);
107            variables.put("description", this.mavenProject.getDescription());
108            variables.put("extension", "deb");
109            variables.put("baseDir", this.mavenProject.getBasedir().getAbsolutePath());
110            variables.put("buildDir", this.buildDirectory);
111            variables.put("project.version", this.mavenProject.getVersion());
112
113            if (this.mavenProject.getInceptionYear() != null) {
114                variables.put("project.inceptionYear", this.mavenProject.getInceptionYear());
115            }
116            if (this.mavenProject.getOrganization() != null) {
117                if (this.mavenProject.getOrganization().getName() != null) {
118                    variables.put("project.organization.name", this.mavenProject.getOrganization().getName());
119                }
120                if (this.mavenProject.getOrganization().getUrl() != null) {
121                    variables.put("project.organization.url", this.mavenProject.getOrganization().getUrl());
122                }
123            }
124
125            variables.put("url", this.mavenProject.getUrl());
126
127            return new MapVariableResolver(variables);
128        }
129    }
130
131}
